data.eml:eml: Revision of Breda and proposal of a new genus (Araneae: Salticidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ruiz, Gustavo R. S., Brescovit, Antonio D. (2013): Revision of Breda and proposal of a new genus (Araneae: Salticidae). Zootaxa 3664 (4): 401-433, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3664.4.1
